title: Alice in Rapture, Sort of
description: It's the summer before junior high, and Alice and her best friends Elizabeth and Pamela are convinced that they need boyfriends to be successful in school. Luckily, Alice has Patrick, who has always been a good friend. But how will he rate as a boyfriend? Alice needs advice about the rules of dating and kissing. Who should she turn to?Between bike rides, a beach date, and loads of surprises and disasters, Alice makes a very important discovery about growing up.
author: Phyllis Reynolds Naylor
